SummaryEnglish: Tomozaki is one of the best gamers in Japan, and in his opinion, the game of real life is one of the worst. No clear-cut rules for success, horribly balanced, and nothing makes sense. But then he meets a gamer who's just as good as him, and she offers to teach him a few exploits...

1.TitleEnglish: Post-game equipment for girls is a little different than usual
1.SummaryEnglish: After stopping for lunch at the caf√© where Kikuchi works, the gang chats about love and dating while she tries to listen in--and stay out of sight.

2.TitleEnglish: Most strange spell names have unknown origins
2.SummaryEnglish: Aoi, Mimimi, and Tama reminisce about the early days of their friendship and a fireworks show that provided the inspiration for Tama's nickname.

1.TitleEnglish: Say what you want; famous games are usually fun
1.SummaryEnglish: Ace gamer Fumiya Tomozaki has given up on the "garbage game" of life, until a classmate offers to teach him the rules of this ultimate god-tier game.

2.TitleEnglish: It feels awesome to gain a bunch of levels after a battle
2.SummaryEnglish: Hinami tasks Tomozaki with starting and joining conversations; after his first few attempts fall flat, he comes away with some astute observations.

3.TitleEnglish: When a girl's your first friend, life feels like a date for a while
3.SummaryEnglish: With Hinami's help, Tomozaki gets a crash course in dressing well and talking to girls, getting unexpectedly close to one classmate in particular.

4.TitleEnglish: Sometimes you conquer a dungeon only to find a strong boss back in your village
4.SummaryEnglish: Tomozaki begins tutoring Izumi in his favorite game, comes clean to Kikuchi, and gets roped into playing against the vengeful Nakamura after school.

5.TitleEnglish: The characters who become your friends after you clear a hard event usually have high stats
5.SummaryEnglish: Tomozaki makes a new friend, then goes on a shopping trip for Nakamura's birthday--of all things. Naturally, Hinami turns it into a teaching moment.

6.TitleEnglish: Once you start speedrunning the minigames, you seriously can't stop
6.SummaryEnglish: The student council election is approaching, and Tomozaki joins Mimimi's campaign. Turns out they both have their reasons for wanting to beat Hinami.

7.TitleEnglish: When a mentor character becomes a boss, they'll push you to the edge
7.SummaryEnglish: Tomozaki brings his gamer's cunning to Mimimi's campaign speech--but Hinami's a gamer, too. Tama tells Tomozaki how she and Mimimi became friends.

8.TitleEnglish: There are some problems a bottom-tier character can't fix alone
8.SummaryEnglish: Mimimi's at her breaking point. A deeper dive into her past reveals why she's so driven to beat Hinami, while Hinami's motivation remains a mystery.

9.TitleEnglish: When you go back to the starter town with the full party, new stuff tends to happen
9.SummaryEnglish: Tomozaki rehearses with Hinami to prepare for his movie date with Kikuchi and is invited to an overnight barbecue with his popular normie classmates.

10.TitleEnglish: Multiplayer games have their own special appeal
10.SummaryEnglish: Tomozaki gets a taste of the traditional overnight normie camp activities he'd always shunned as the group plots to get Izumi and Nakamura together.

11.TitleEnglish: A single choice can change everything
11.SummaryEnglish: An overheard conversation between Mizusawa and Hinami gives Tomozaki a different perspective on his private lessons in conquering the game of life.

12.TitleEnglish: Equipment for girls has special effects
12.SummaryEnglish: A talk with Kikuchi helps Tomozaki realize what he really wants, and a confrontation with Hinami sets the course for the future of their relationship.

1.TitleEnglish: The Best Games Make Reconnaissance Fun
1.SummaryEnglish: As the second term begins, Tomozaki's first task (courtesy of Hinano) is getting popular girl Erika Konno motivated for the school sports tournament.

2.TitleEnglish: A Happy Ending Doesn't Mean This Game Is Over
2.SummaryEnglish: Erika Konno starts lashing out at her classmates after the school's sports festival, and opinions are deeply divided on the best way to shut her down.

3.TitleEnglish: Battles Are Better When You're Against Someone Whose Signature Move Is the Opposite of Yours
3.SummaryEnglish: Tomozaki enlists the help of friends to help Tama improve and boost the mood at school, but Aoi Hinami is vehemently opposed to Tama changing at all.

4.TitleEnglish: Villagers Have Their Own Way of Life
4.SummaryEnglish: Team Tomozaki continues to coach Tama in becoming more integrated with the class. Tomozaki brings in a special pinch-hitter with wise words to share.

5.TitleEnglish: If You Keep Upgrading Your Initial Equipment, It'll Usually Become Your Most Powerful Weapon
5.SummaryEnglish: Simmering classroom unrest over Konno and Tama reaches a boiling point as Aoi steps in, revealing a side of herself that Tomozaki didn't want to see.

6.TitleEnglish: Everyone Has Different Expectations About a Big Event
6.SummaryEnglish: Tomozaki confronts Hinami over her handling of the Konno affair. He's tasked with making a good impression on his classmates, plus a big decision.

7.TitleEnglish: Important Items Are Usually Lying Around in Enchanted Forests
7.SummaryEnglish: It's up to Tomozaki to find a suitable play to perform at the culture festival, all while trying to check more of Hinami's tasks off his Pinsta list.

8.TitleEnglish: Sometimes the Main Character Can't Enter the Village of Another Species on His Own
8.SummaryEnglish: Tomozaki and Mizusawa scope out a girls' school festival (and its girls). Tomozaki has a deep discussion with Fuka the author. Mimimi drops a bomb.

9.TitleEnglish: If You Don't Make Up Your Mind, the Story Won't Advance
9.SummaryEnglish: Things get awkward around Mimimi. Tomozaki finally chooses the two girls he'd like to pursue, and Hinami gives him more tasks in pursuit of his goals.

10.TitleEnglish: The Patterns Carved into the Stone Tablet Are Connected to the Mysteries of the World
10.SummaryEnglish: Roles are assigned in the class play, and Kikuchi goes in a new direction while revising her script; as research, she wants to know more about Hinami.

11.TitleEnglish: Even Fairies Feel Lonely When They're Away from Their Spring by Themselves
11.SummaryEnglish: As rehearsals begin and Kikuchi polishes her script, she reveals her philosophy to a concerned Tomozaki. Mimimi and Tomozaki work on their comedy.

12.TitleEnglish: Sometimes the Ancient Tome in the First Town Is the Key to the Final Dungeon
12.SummaryEnglish: Tomozaki tries to show Kikuchi the issues with her world view. Mimimi and Tomozaki perform their comedy routine. The curtain rises on the class play.

13.TitleEnglish: You're Sure to Find What You Want on the Other Side of the Magic Door
13.SummaryEnglish: The class play goes off without a hitch, but with a surprise twist. Afterward, Tomozaki seeks out Kikuchi for a conversation about their relationship.
